Entries.DialogueText: Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings! I'm Demetrius, local scientist and father. Thanks for introducing yourself!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you met my daughter Maru? She's interested to meet you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you met my daughter Maru? She's interested to meet you.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, this is a rare substance. I'll have to take it to the lab for... uh... further analysis.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, this is a rare substance. I'll have to take it to the lab for... uh... further analysis.

Entries.DialogueText: A present!... with optimal timing. Today is the anniversary of my birth. Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A present!... with optimal timing. Today is the anniversary of my birth. Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: A present!... with optimal timing. Today is the anniversary of my birth. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A present!... with optimal timing. Today is the anniversary of my birth.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see what it is... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see what it is...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Oh. {Portrait:Sad}
Wow, an intact dinosaur egg! This is an extremely rare specimen. Now, if only it could be incubated...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, an intact dinosaur egg! This is an extremely rare specimen. Now, if only it could be incubated...

Entries.DialogueText: I already spotted a rare crab. This place is great. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I already spotted a rare crab. This place is great.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't mind me, {Farmer_Name}. I'm just collecting some samples. This may be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity! {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't mind me, . I'm just collecting some samples. This may be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!

Entries.DialogueText: Erm... If you see my wife, can you tell her I'm okay? {Portrait:Custom:7}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Erm... If you see my wife, can you tell her I'm okay?

Entries.DialogueText: The rain appears to be harmless, so I'm taking less precaution this year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The rain appears to be harmless, so I'm taking less precaution this year.

Entries.DialogueText: I heard you visited Calico Desert recently. How fascinating! I'm sure you observed many unique life forms on your trip.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you visited Calico Desert recently. How fascinating! I'm sure you observed many unique life forms on your trip.

Entries.DialogueText: Checking up on the melon research? Yes, I... uh... 'analyzed' it, and it certainly has an optimal macronutrient profile...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Checking up on the melon research? Yes, I... uh... 'analyzed' it, and it certainly has an optimal macronutrient profile...

Entries.DialogueText: Say that again!? You successfully incubated a dinosaur egg? This is unprecedented! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Say that again!? You successfully incubated a dinosaur egg? This is unprecedented!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take my coffee, I'm all worked up now... I can't drink any more. [253]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take my coffee, I'm all worked up now... I can't drink any more.

Entries.DialogueText: Yes, Maru told me the news. I can't say I'm thrilled about it, but maybe you'll prove me wrong. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes, Maru told me the news. I can't say I'm thrilled about it, but maybe you'll prove me wrong.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... {Farmer_Name}, I've come to accept that it's time for my 'little girl' to become a woman. You have my blessing. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... , I've come to accept that it's time for my 'little girl' to become a woman. You have my blessing.

Entries.DialogueText: Congratulations on the marriage. Robin's been crying since the wedding. 'Tears of joy', as she calls it! A most peculiar concept...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Congratulations on the marriage. Robin's been crying since the wedding. 'Tears of joy', as she calls it! A most peculiar concept...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, now that the basement is unoccupied, I might have to expand the laboratory... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, now that the basement is unoccupied, I might have to expand the laboratory...

Entries.DialogueText: How's that cave experiment coming along? Has it produced anything of value yet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's that cave experiment coming along? Has it produced anything of value yet?

Entries.DialogueText: Ah! That means the conditions must be more suitable than I originally theorized... hmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah! That means the conditions must be more suitable than I originally theorized... hmm...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, keep checking on it every now and then. I'm sure those little guys will yield something eventually.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, keep checking on it every now and then. I'm sure those little guys will yield something eventually.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't forget to check that farm cave! There's bound to be something useful in there by now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't forget to check that farm cave! There's bound to be something useful in there by now.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be analyzing this data for months.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be analyzing this data for months.

Entries.DialogueText: *crunch*... whoops, there goes an endangered crab species... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *crunch*... whoops, there goes an endangered crab species...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, never mind. It was just the empty shell! I can sleep tonight.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, never mind. It was just the empty shell! I can sleep tonight.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you having fun, {Farmer_Name}? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you having fun, ? You need to remember to take breaks now and then too!

Entries.DialogueText: I usually don't partake... but I'm usually not on a tropical island, either. Hahaha. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I usually don't partake... but I'm usually not on a tropical island, either. Hahaha.

Entries.DialogueText: Can you believe this place? It's teeming with exotic life!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can you believe this place? It's teeming with exotic life!

Entries.DialogueText: It's a good specimen, but a very common species. You can keep it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a good specimen, but a very common species. You can keep it.

Entries.DialogueText: Fruit and salt? What an odd combination... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fruit and salt? What an odd combination...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!

Entries.DialogueText: I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...

Entries.DialogueText: Maru helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maru helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to do good science without Maru's help...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to do good science without Maru's help...

Entries.DialogueText: But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.DisplayPattern: But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!

Entries.DialogueText: This valley has a very vibrant and diverse ecosystem. That's one reason I was excited to move here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This valley has a very vibrant and diverse ecosystem. That's one reason I was excited to move here.

Entries.DialogueText: You're probably growing a lot of interesting plants on your farm, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're probably growing a lot of interesting plants on your farm, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I'll stop by your place some day and check it out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I'll stop by your place some day and check it out.

Entries.DialogueText: How's the farming business going? It's parsnip season, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the farming business going? It's parsnip season, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.

Entries.DialogueText: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't tell her I said that. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't tell her I said that.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see... If compounds in the rhizosphere contain sufficient levels of Carbon-13, then... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see... If compounds in the rhizosphere contain sufficient levels of Carbon-13, then...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need anything?

Entries.DialogueText: It's good to take a break from work every now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's good to take a break from work every now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess that's kind of difficult when you live on a farm, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess that's kind of difficult when you live on a farm, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, at least in the winter you don't have to worry about crops.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, at least in the winter you don't have to worry about crops.

Entries.DialogueText: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.

Entries.DialogueText: ...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}! How are you doing today?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi ! How are you doing today?

Entries.DialogueText: I wish I could make your farming job easier somehow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish I could make your farming job easier somehow.

Entries.DialogueText: Really? I figured a farmer would know the correct answer... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Really? I figured a farmer would know the correct answer...

Entries.DialogueText: See? {Farmer_Name} agrees with me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: See? agrees with me.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, we'd better titrate this solution before it crystallizes on us.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, we'd better titrate this solution before it crystallizes on us.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...

Entries.DialogueText: Demetrius is deep in thought.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Demetrius is deep in thought.

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry, I'm really busy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry, I'm really busy.

Entries.DialogueText: There's so many plants to study right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's so many plants to study right now.

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure to water your plants every day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure to water your plants every day.

Entries.DialogueText: Although, if you're using water retaining soil you don't need to worry about watering as often.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Although, if you're using water retaining soil you don't need to worry about watering as often.

Entries.DialogueText: It's pretty convenient.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's pretty convenient.

Entries.DialogueText: How's the farming business going? It's tomato season, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the farming business going? It's tomato season, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.

Entries.DialogueText: So I heard Maru had you look through that telescope out back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: So I heard Maru had you look through that telescope out back.

Entries.DialogueText: If you and Maru become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you and Maru become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.

Entries.DialogueText: Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Pretty exciting, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: I hope my daughter's keeping up on her math and science!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope my daughter's keeping up on her math and science!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... If strigolactone levels could be increased, would it have a proportional effect on mycorrhizal growth? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... If strigolactone levels could be increased, would it have a proportional effect on mycorrhizal growth?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need anything?

Entries.DialogueText: I became a scientist because I wanted to contribute to the progression of our species.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I became a scientist because I wanted to contribute to the progression of our species.

Entries.DialogueText: Of course, none of this would be possible without farmers such as yourself. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Of course, none of this would be possible without farmers such as yourself.

Entries.DialogueText: During this time of year I divert my attentions to fungi.
Entries.DisplayPattern: During this time of year I divert my attentions to fungi.

Entries.DialogueText: We know a lot about nature thanks to science.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We know a lot about nature thanks to science.

Entries.DialogueText: But there's always a lot more to learn.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But there's always a lot more to learn.

Entries.DialogueText: How's the farming business going? It's corn season, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the farming business going? It's corn season, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.

Entries.DialogueText: Maru sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maru sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad she's so dedicated.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad she's so dedicated.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm still flabbergasted about Maru's secret robot... was it all a dream?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm still flabbergasted about Maru's secret robot... was it all a dream?

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see... perhaps the nitrogen fixation level is affected by nematode secretions... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see... perhaps the nitrogen fixation level is affected by nematode secretions...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Sorry. I was pondering some data and I didn't notice you there.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need anything?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}. I'm always glad when you come for a visit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi . I'm always glad when you come for a visit.

Entries.DialogueText: It's nice to have some company after all this lonely lab-work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's nice to have some company after all this lonely lab-work.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm taking a break from my research right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm taking a break from my research right now.

Entries.DialogueText: Talk to my wife if you want to increase the size of your house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Talk to my wife if you want to increase the size of your house.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have a kitchen in your house yet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have a kitchen in your house yet?

Entries.DialogueText: Cooking is kind of like doing lab work.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cooking is kind of like doing lab work.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have any animals on your farm?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have any animals on your farm?

Entries.DialogueText: Hello.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello.

Entries.DialogueText: Demetrius seems lost in thought.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Demetrius seems lost in thought.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see... if seasonal nitrogen levels could be modeled by a piecewise function... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see... if seasonal nitrogen levels could be modeled by a piecewise function...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Sorry. I was analyzing data and I didn't notice you there.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! Sorry. I was analyzing data and I didn't notice you there.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you need anything?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you need anything?

Entries.DialogueText: Feel free to harvest as much lumber and stone from this area as you please.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feel free to harvest as much lumber and stone from this area as you please.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for stopping by. I need to think about something other than legumes for a while.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for stopping by. I need to think about something other than legumes for a while.

Entries.DialogueText: So, what have you been doing lately?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, what have you been doing lately?

Entries.DialogueText: That sounds interesting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That sounds interesting.

Entries.DialogueText: Greetings. Stay inside if you want to keep warm.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings. Stay inside if you want to keep warm.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi {Farmer_Name}! I have some good news for you. A few days ago I made a breakthrough in my research on the local environment. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi ! I have some good news for you. A few days ago I made a breakthrough in my research on the local environment.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll spare you the technical details and get to the point... You know that empty cave you have, over in the cliffs?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll spare you the technical details and get to the point... You know that empty cave you have, over in the cliffs?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I have a way to turn it into something useful... for both of us.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I have a way to turn it into something useful... for both of us.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd like to set up the cave to attract some local species. That way I can observe them in a more controlled environment. And you can harvest whatever products they produce.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd like to set up the cave to attract some local species. That way I can observe them in a more controlled environment. And you can harvest whatever products they produce.

Entries.DialogueText: I can either set up the cave to attract mushrooms or fruit bats. The bats will sometimes leave fruit for you to collect.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can either set up the cave to attract mushrooms or fruit bats. The bats will sometimes leave fruit for you to collect.

Entries.DialogueText: Alright! I'll go set it up for you right now! It shouldn't take any time at all. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright! I'll go set it up for you right now! It shouldn't take any time at all.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for letting me do this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for letting me do this.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm excited to see what happens with that cave. Aren't you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited to see what happens with that cave. Aren't you?

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you're pleased with the work I did.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you're pleased with the work I did.

Entries.DialogueText: I love your art, Leah! 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace' is my favorite. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love your art, Leah! 'Post-Dimensional Nullspace' is my favorite.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm in.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for helping out, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for helping out, .

Entries.DialogueText: Maru's a good kid. She's my special little girl...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maru's a good kid. She's my special little girl...

Entries.DialogueText: I wouldn't want anything getting in the way of her bright future, know what I mean? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wouldn't want anything getting in the way of her bright future, know what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: Just some food for thought... *chuckle* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just some food for thought... *chuckle*

Entries.DialogueText: ...I was just telling {Farmer_Name} about the soil samples we're testing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I was just telling about the soil samples we're testing.

Entries.DialogueText: Right, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Right, ?

Entries.DialogueText: (Say nothing)
Entries.DisplayPattern: (Say nothing)

Entries.DialogueText: Actually, your Dad was being weird.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Actually, your Dad was being weird.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, okay... we were talking about you, sweetie. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, okay... we were talking about you, sweetie.

Entries.DialogueText: I wanted to say a few things to {Farmer_Name} about you... but I didn't want to embarrass you. I shouldn't have lied about it. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wanted to say a few things to about you... but I didn't want to embarrass you. I shouldn't have lied about it.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't understand. Tomatoes are fruits!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't understand. Tomatoes are fruits!

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}! I'm glad you're here. You'll be able to put this argument to rest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ! I'm glad you're here. You'll be able to put this argument to rest.

Entries.DialogueText: How would you classify a tomato?
Entries.DisplayPattern: How would you classify a tomato?

Entries.DialogueText: Vegetable
Entries.DisplayPattern: Vegetable

Entries.DialogueText: Fruit
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fruit

Entries.DialogueText: I just want you to understand my point of view.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I just want you to understand my point of view.

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard for me to know exactly what assumptions I should make when you tell me something.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard for me to know exactly what assumptions I should make when you tell me something.

Entries.DialogueText: But I'll try to get better at it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I'll try to get better at it.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for your help, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for your help, .

Entries.DialogueText: Ah Ha! I knew it! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah Ha! I knew it!

Entries.DialogueText: Agh! What is it?! {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Agh! What is it?!

Entries.DialogueText: Sweet Yoba... it talks! {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sweet Yoba... it talks!

Entries.DialogueText: This is why you've locked yourself in your room the last few months? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is why you've locked yourself in your room the last few months?

Entries.DialogueText: ...and I thought you were down here fooling around with {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and I thought you were down here fooling around with ...

Entries.DialogueText: It's okay, Maru. Let MarILDA go free. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's okay, Maru. Let MarILDA go free.

Entries.DialogueText: Your mother and I can take care of ourselves. I know you're ready to start a life of your own, and I've come to terms with the thought of not having you around anymore.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your mother and I can take care of ourselves. I know you're ready to start a life of your own, and I've come to terms with the thought of not having you around anymore.

Entries.DialogueText: Besides, this... creation of yours seems pretty advanced. It wouldn't feel right to keep her as a servant.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Besides, this... creation of yours seems pretty advanced. It wouldn't feel right to keep her as a servant.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, I'm sorry I mistrusted you. You're a good guy. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: , I'm sorry I mistrusted you. You're a good guy.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, I'm sorry I mistrusted you. You're a fine young woman. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: , I'm sorry I mistrusted you. You're a fine young woman.

Entries.DialogueText: I've never seen Maru so lively and creative... and I've never been more proud of her. If you've had a hand in that, then you have my gratitude.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've never seen Maru so lively and creative... and I've never been more proud of her. If you've had a hand in that, then you have my gratitude.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Robin? What's the point of the four posts? It seems like an inefficient use of materials. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Robin? What's the point of the four posts? It seems like an inefficient use of materials.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, I see your point.. But we can't let that outweigh the utility and efficiency of the sleep receptacle.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, I see your point.. But we can't let that outweigh the utility and efficiency of the sleep receptacle.

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem*... Well... If anyone needs me, I'll be in the doghouse... {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem*... Well... If anyone needs me, I'll be in the doghouse...

Entries.DialogueText: Great minds think alike... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great minds think alike...

Entries.DialogueText: Robin really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Robin really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.

Entries.DialogueText: Sheep have remarkable memory capabilities... retaining familiarity with both fellow sheep and humans... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sheep have remarkable memory capabilities... retaining familiarity with both fellow sheep and humans...

Entries.DialogueText: They even form friendships, mirroring the close bonds we humans cultivate with one another! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They even form friendships, mirroring the close bonds we humans cultivate with one another!

Entries.DialogueText: I haven't seen Maru in hours... I hope she's alright.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I haven't seen Maru in hours... I hope she's alright.

Entries.DialogueText: Did you know... a study in the Journal of Anthropological Physiology found that the cadence, tempo, and key of music can have a measurable impact on cortisol levels?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you know... a study in the Journal of Anthropological Physiology found that the cadence, tempo, and key of music can have a measurable impact on cortisol levels?

Entries.DialogueText: Er... Is there vanilla ice cream to go with the blackberry cobbler? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Er... Is there vanilla ice cream to go with the blackberry cobbler?

Entries.DialogueText: Egg... what a strange thing to eat.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Egg... what a strange thing to eat.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey {Farmer_Name}, did you get a taste of my carp roe pie?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey , did you get a taste of my carp roe pie?

Entries.DialogueText: ...What? It is the 'egg' festival, isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...What? It is the 'egg' festival, isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals.
Entries.DisplayPattern: These springtime dances can be traced back to ancient fertility rituals.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... You should know about this stuff, farmer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... You should know about this stuff, farmer.

Entries.DialogueText: Gatherings like this give a sense of identity to our community.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gatherings like this give a sense of identity to our community.

Entries.DialogueText: Or as my wife says... 'it makes the town lively'!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or as my wife says... 'it makes the town lively'!

Entries.DialogueText: This is tiring, honey. Are you ready to visit the buffet soon? *pant*
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is tiring, honey. Are you ready to visit the buffet soon? *pant*

Entries.DialogueText: Why do humans enjoy dancing? Perhaps it is an instinctual mechanism, so that we will inadvertently convey our genetic quality to potential mates?%noturn
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why do humans enjoy dancing? Perhaps it is an instinctual mechanism, so that we will inadvertently convey our genetic quality to potential mates?

Entries.DialogueText: The 'Moonlight Jelly'... what a remarkable species! We're very lucky that they stop here on their long journey south.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The 'Moonlight Jelly'... what a remarkable species! We're very lucky that they stop here on their long journey south.

Entries.DialogueText: It's unknown why they are attracted to light... very curious.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's unknown why they are attracted to light... very curious.

Entries.DialogueText: There's a different kind of 'jelly', that anglers sometimes pull out of the water. Despite the name, they are very different in nature to the Moonlight Jellies...
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's a different kind of 'jelly', that anglers sometimes pull out of the water. Despite the name, they are very different in nature to the Moonlight Jellies...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll probably get another tool set this year... *sigh*
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll probably get another tool set this year... *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... this green jelly has a minty flavor to it. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... this green jelly has a minty flavor to it.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder how mint became associated with the Feast Of The Winter Star? Does mint even grow in Winter? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder how mint became associated with the Feast Of The Winter Star? Does mint even grow in Winter?

Entries.DialogueText: You know what? I probably should've worn a jacket.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know what? I probably should've worn a jacket.

Entries.DialogueText: Water ice... a most profound substance, indeed. Necessary for life, it makes a fitting material for statuary meant to represent the living form.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Water ice... a most profound substance, indeed. Necessary for life, it makes a fitting material for statuary meant to represent the living form.

Entries.DialogueText: You're giving this to me? This is amazing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're giving this to me? This is amazing!

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you! This is a very interesting specimen.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you! This is a very interesting specimen.

Entries.DialogueText: ...What is this?
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...What is this?

Entries.DialogueText: This is disgusting.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is disgusting.

Entries.DialogueText: That was very thoughtful of you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was very thoughtful of you.

Entries.DialogueText: A short jaunt in the snow really gets the blood flowing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: A short jaunt in the snow really gets the blood flowing.

Entries.DialogueText: Longings of the heart...? Oh! You mean 'elevated levels of oxytocin in the limbic system'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Longings of the heart...? Oh! You mean 'elevated levels of oxytocin in the limbic system'.

Entries.DialogueText: Demetrius is furrowing his brow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Demetrius is furrowing his brow.

Entries.DialogueText: The art of film has come a long way since those times, hasn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The art of film has come a long way since those times, hasn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: This movie supposedly takes place in a 'futuristic' society... it will be interesting to see what that looks like!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This movie supposedly takes place in a 'futuristic' society... it will be interesting to see what that looks like!

Entries.DialogueText: Great movie... but I wonder if there really is life beyond this planet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Great movie... but I wonder if there really is life beyond this planet?

Entries.DialogueText: This one's right up my alley... you know I'm gonna love this. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This one's right up my alley... you know I'm gonna love this.

Entries.DialogueText: Technically, that's not correct... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Technically, that's not correct...

Entries.DialogueText: Demetrius is scratching his chin...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Demetrius is scratching his chin...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, they definitely embellished some things, but it was still mostly correct! Anyway, I had a good time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, they definitely embellished some things, but it was still mostly correct! Anyway, I had a good time.

Entries.DialogueText: I read about this one in the paper... didn't seem like the thing for me. But I'll give it a shot.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I read about this one in the paper... didn't seem like the thing for me. But I'll give it a shot.

Entries.DialogueText: Nonsense! That was totally unscientific! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Nonsense! That was totally unscientific!

Entries.DialogueText: Even if a movie is bad, it's interesting to analyze.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Even if a movie is bad, it's interesting to analyze.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I wonder what aspect of human motivation is satisfied by the narrative of this film? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I wonder what aspect of human motivation is satisfied by the narrative of this film?

Entries.DialogueText: Why do humans enjoy spicy food? It's counter-intuitive from a biological perspective.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why do humans enjoy spicy food? It's counter-intuitive from a biological perspective.

Entries.DialogueText: Unless there's something I'm missing... {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Unless there's something I'm missing...

Entries.DialogueText: Do you have any eggs to trade? I'm studying the composition of the shell.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you have any eggs to trade? I'm studying the composition of the shell.
